name: anyrand
description: Permissionless verifiable randomness on any EVM

scripts.deploy:scroll: yarn hardhat ignition deploy ignition/modules/AnyrandScroll.ts --network scroll --verify
scripts.deploy:scrollSepolia: yarn hardhat ignition deploy ignition/modules/AnyrandScroll.ts --network scrollSepolia --verify
scripts.deploy:base: yarn hardhat ignition deploy ignition/modules/AnyrandOptimism.ts --network base --verify
scripts.deploy:base:fixedfee: yarn hardhat ignition deploy ignition/modules/AnyrandFixedFee.ts --network base --verify
scripts.deploy:degen:fixedfee: yarn hardhat ignition deploy ignition/modules/AnyrandFixedFee.ts --network degen --parameters ignition/config/degen.json --verify
scripts.deploy:gnosis:fixedfee: yarn hardhat ignition deploy ignition/modules/AnyrandFixedFee.ts --network gnosis --parameters ignition/config/gnosis.json --verify

author: Kevin Charm <kevin@frogworks.io>
